DADOS-GERAIS.NOME-EM-CITACOES-BIBLIOGRAFICAS: SAVI, L. K.;SAVI, LIZANDRA KAMRADT;SAVI, L.K.

RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Graduada em Engenharia de Alimentos pela Universidade Estadual de Ponta Grossa (2005), possui mestrado (2013) e doutorado (2019) pela Universidade Federal do Paran no Programa de Ps Graduao em Engenharia de Alimentos atuou nos seguintes temas no perodo da Ps-Graduao: Anlises trmicas, propriedades fisico-qumicas, reolgicas de alimentos, desenvolvimento de produtos (solventes naturais, NADES). Tem experincia na rea de Cincia e Tecnologia de Alimentos, Gesto da Qualidade na Indstria de Alimentos, Ministrou treinamentos na Industria de Alimentos e aulas no curso Tcnico de Gastronomia, Confeitaria e Panificao. Tem experincia na rea de higiene na indstria de alimentos e Boas Prticas de Fabricao e Consultoria privada em empresa do ramo alimentcio.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: Graduated in Food Engineering from the State University of Ponta Grossa (2005), has a master's degree (2013) and a doctorate (2019) from the Federal University of Paran in the Postgraduate Program in Food Engineering, worked in the following subjects during the Postgraduate period: Thermal analysis, physico-chemical, rheological properties of foods, product development (natural solvents, NADES). He has experience in the area of ​​Food Science and Technology, Quality Management in the Food Industry, taught training in the Food Industry and classes in the Technical Course of Gastronomy, Confectionery and Bakery. He has experience in the area of ​​hygiene in the food industry and Good Manufacturing Practices and industry consulting in a food company.
